author: prbuzz.com
title: Futrena Technologies Inc. gets listed on Institutional Funding Marketplace
text:
TORONTO – The OCMX ™ is pleased to announce the listing of Futrena Technology Inc. on its Institutional Marketplace. The OCMX™ will offer accredited investors the ability to participate in the equity raise through its Crowdfunding Portal.
The OCMX™ spent the past months completing its due diligence process on Futrena and concluded that the company represents significant opportunity for accredited investors.
They note that Futrena, which sources products from startups, inventors, and other innovators all over the world, exhibits the main components of any solid investment, namely a significant market size and definite competitive advantages. For more information on Futrena, visit their market listing page .
The Opportunity
Futrena is an online marketplace for innovative, pioneering, and modern design products from all over the world and from innovators big and small. They source products from startups, inventors, and other innovators all over the world, and present a unique selection of products to customers unlike anything else they have ever seen. Futrena can provide all-in-one support: help get new product ideas prototyped, manufactured, distributed, marketed, and sold, for the innovators that they partner with.
The OCMX
The OCMX™ is changing Corporate Finance as we know it through its Online Institutional Marketplace. Their marketplace serves as a highly structured online portal for both private and public entities which need additional growth capital by way of connecting the relevant advisors, companies, and investors in one online transparent marketplace.
The OCMX™ specializes in advising and raising capital for leading growth enterprises. They provide advisors, companies, and investors with instant access to their Online Institutional Marketplace so that they can actively source and screen their next investment opportunity or financing partner.
The OCMX™ specializes in Early Stage Financing, Equity Markets, Project Financing, Business Finance, Corporate Finance, and helping companies with Going Public. Learn more about The OCMX™ by visiting their marketplace .
